frontmatter.title: Toggletip
frontmatter.description: Toggletips use the disclosure pattern to toggle the visibility of a popover. They display additional, hidden information upon the click of a UI trigger element and can contain interactive elements.

internal.content:
--- title: Toggletip description: Toggletips use the disclosure pattern to toggle the visibility of a popover. They display additional, hidden information upon the click of a UI trigger element and can contain interactive elements. tabs: ['Usage', 'Style', 'Code'] --- Preview the Toggletip component with the React live demo.
